about_the_game:
Welcome to Christmas Sort Puzzle, a delightful and challenging game that will immerse you in the festive spirit of Christmas. Get ready to engage your brain and test your sorting skills as you organize and arrange colorful holiday-themed objects in the correct order.

In this captivating puzzle game, your objective is to sort and arrange various Christmas items such as ornaments, gifts, snowflakes, stockings, and more. The objects are scattered on the screen, and it's up to you to slide and swap them to find the perfect arrangement. Your keen eye and logical thinking will be crucial in solving each level.

As you progress through the game, the challenges become more intricate and demanding. You'll encounter complex patterns and arrangements that require careful analysis and strategic moves to solve. Pay attention to details, observe the hints, and use your problem-solving skills to overcome each puzzle and unlock the next.

Immerse yourself in the joyous atmosphere of Christmas with stunning visuals, cheerful music, and delightful sound effects. Experience the warmth and excitement of the holiday season as you unravel the puzzles one by one. The game offers a relaxing and enjoyable experience for players of all ages.

Christmas Sort Puzzle is the perfect game to unwind during the holiday season or any time you crave a festive challenge. Sharpen your mind, embrace the holiday spirit, and indulge in the satisfying puzzle-solving experience that awaits you.

Get ready to immerse yourself in a world of holiday cheer and logical thinking. Enjoy the delightful Christmas-themed visuals, challenging puzzles, and the joy that comes with successfully sorting and arranging festive objects. Let the holiday spirit guide you as you conquer each level of the Christmas Sort Puzzle.

HOW TO PLAY:
• Tap any tube to move the icon lying on top of any tube into another tube
• The rule is that you can only move an icon on top of another icon if both of them have the same icon and the tube you want to move into has enough space. Otherwise, the ball is rejected.
• You can always restart the level at any time.
• Stack all the icons with the same icon into a single tube.

★ FEATURES:
• 4 game modes (100 levels each).
• Elegant background music.
• Run smoothly
• NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy Christmas Sort Puzzle at your own pace!
